W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BIG_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BIG_DETAIL.text: A pillar of light where witches gather. Constantly absorbing magical energy, it's effectively the center of the world, though it also connects to other worlds as well.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_RED_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_RED_DETAIL.text: A perpetually smoldering castle of hellfire. Home to the sagely Red Witch.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU_DETAIL.text: A castle within a great tree that's covered in the fresh, eternal vegetation of early summer. Home to the sagely Blue Witch.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_WHI_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_WHI_DETAIL.text: The stronghold for witches of the white, made from gold and marble. Home to the sagely White Witch.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_YEL01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_YEL01_DETAIL.text: A magical pinwheel where witches of the yellow live. It has a habit of moving about on a whim.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_YEL05_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_YEL05_DETAIL.text: The Dusk Pinwheel has returned to its original region. You can only hope it isn't going to move again any time soon.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLA_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLA_DETAIL.text: The stronghold for witches of the black. A lake so cold it freezes you to your core stands between you and it.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLA2_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLA2_DETAIL.text: The crystallization process has begun at Castle Black Swan. You must ensure it doesn't reach the castle.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLA3_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLA3_DETAIL.text: The area in front of the castle has become a warzone, and the crystallization is now pronounced. If the witches of the black don't achieve victory quickly, the crystallization will reach the castle.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLA4_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLA4_DETAIL.text: The home of the black witches has succumbed to the Calamity and turned to crystal.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLA5_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLA5_DETAIL.text: The crystals are no more, and the immediate danger has passed. However, you can't afford to let your guard down until the battle with the Calamity is over.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU2_TITLE.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU2_TITLE.text: Crystallizing Tree of the Forever Young

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU2_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU2_DETAIL.text: The crystallization process has begun at the Tree of the Forever Young. You must ensure it doesn't reach the tree.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU3_TITLE.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU3_TITLE.text: Imperiled Tree of the Forever Young

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU3_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU3_DETAIL.text: The area in front of the tree has become a warzone, and the crystallization is now pronounced. If the witches of the blue don't achieve victory quickly, the crystallization will reach the castle.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU4_TITLE.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU4_TITLE.text: Crystallized Tree of the Forever Young

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU4_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU4_DETAIL.text: The home of the blue witches has succumbed to the Calamity and turned to crystal.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU5_TITLE.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU5_TITLE.text: Liberated Tree of the Forever Young

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU5_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_BLU5_DETAIL.text: The crystals are no more, and the immediate danger has passed. However, you can't afford to let your guard down until the battle with the Calamity is over.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_RED2_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_RED2_DETAIL.text: The crystallization process has begun at the Flame Fortress. You must ensure it doesn't reach the fortress.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_RED3_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_RED3_DETAIL.text: The area in front of the fortress has become a warzone, and the crystallization is now pronounced. If the witches of the red don't achieve victory quickly, the crystallization will reach the fortress.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_RED4_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_RED4_DETAIL.text: The home of the red witches has succumbed to the Calamity and turned to crystal.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_RED5_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_RED5_DETAIL.text: The crystals are no more, and the immediate danger has passed. However, you can't afford to let your guard down until the battle with the Calamity is over.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_YEL2_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_YEL2_DETAIL.text: The Dusk Pinwheel has begun to crystallize, and crystals are covering the land. If the process is left unchecked, it won't be easy to reverse.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_YEL3_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_YEL3_DETAIL.text: The area where the pinwheel will land has become a war zone, and the crystallization is now pronounced. If the witches of the yellow don't win quickly, the crystallization will reach the pinwheel.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_YEL4_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_YEL4_DETAIL.text: The Dusk Pinwheel has succumbed to the Calamity and turned to crystal.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_YEL5_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_YEL5_DETAIL.text: The crystals are no more, and the immediate danger has passed. However, you can't afford to let your guard down until the battle with the Calamity is over.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_WHI2_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_WHI2_DETAIL.text: The crystallization process has begun at Leone Bianco Palazzo. You must ensure it doesn't reach the palazzo.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_WHI3_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_WHI3_DETAIL.text: The area in front of the palazzo has become a warzone, and the crystallization is now pronounced. If the witches of the white don't achieve victory quickly, the crystallization will reach the palazzo.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_WHI4_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_WHI4_DETAIL.text: The home of the white witches has succumbed to the Calamity and turned to crystal.

W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_WHI5_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_CASTLE_WHI5_DETAIL.text: The crystals are no more, and the immediate danger has passed. However, you can't afford to let your guard down until the battle with the Calamity is over.

W02_LTXT_COMM_TWN_OLD_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_TWN_OLD_DETAIL.text: An old castle where witches supposedly lived at one time. Its gates are now shut, preventing any unwelcome guests from setting foot inside.

W02_LTXT_COMM_TWN_SER_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_TWN_SER_DETAIL.text: A settlement populated by the squires who serve the sages.

W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_WHI_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_WHI_DETAIL.text: A mine within the White Sage's territory. Cave-ins are frequent, making it a rather dangerous location.

W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_BLU_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_BLU_DETAIL.text: A deep, vast forest area protected by the witches of the blue. A great power can supposedly be found in its depths.

W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_YEL_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_YEL_DETAIL.text: The entrance to an underground rift. Fiends are known to appear here.

W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_RED_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_RED_DETAIL.text: A tower for trials constructed by the witches of the red. Its searing flames can melt gold in an instant.

W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_BLA_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_BLA_DETAIL.text: The entrance to an underground waterway that leads to the black castle.

W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_BIG_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_BIG_DETAIL.text: A large greenhouse in which various magical plants are cultivated. It's under the effect of a spell that makes it larger on the inside than the outside.

W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_CRYSTAL_BLA_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_CRYSTAL_BLA_DETAIL.text: The Ebon Sluice and the surrounding area have been turned to crystal.

W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_CRYSTAL_BLU_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_CRYSTAL_BLU_DETAIL.text: The Blue Forest and the surrounding area have been turned to crystal.

W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_CRYSTAL_RED_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_CRYSTAL_RED_DETAIL.text: The Scorching Tower and the surrounding area have been turned to crystal.

W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_CRYSTAL_YEL_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_CRYSTAL_YEL_DETAIL.text: The area around the rift entrance has been turned to crystal.

W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_CRYSTAL_WHI_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_LTXT_COMM_DUN_CRYSTAL_WHI_DETAIL.text: The area around the mine has been crystallized. The inside of the mine is also in peril.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_AREA01.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_AREA01.text: The Calamity has begun to cause crystallization. If you don't do something quickly, the effects will spread unchecked across the land.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_AREA01.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_AREA01.text: The witches have managed to push back against the crystals, and are on the cusp of eradicating them from this region entirely.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_AREA02.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_AREA02.text: The crystallization process continues to spread across the land, and the witches are proving powerless to stop it.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_AREA02.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_AREA02.text: The witches have managed to push back against the crystallization, but they may not be able to keep it up.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_AREA03.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_AREA03.text: Black Battlefield: Castle Black Swan in Danger

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_AREA03.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_AREA03.text: The wave of crystallization is approaching Castle Black Swan. At this rate, it won't be long before the entire region turns to crystal.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_AREA01.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_AREA01.text: The Calamity has begun to cause crystallization. If you don't do something quickly, the effects will spread unchecked across the land.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_AREA01.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_AREA01.text: The witches have managed to push back against the crystals, and are on the cusp of eradicating them from this region entirely.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_AREA02.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_AREA02.text: The crystallization process continues to spread across the land, and the witches are proving powerless to stop it.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_AREA02.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_AREA02.text: The witches have managed to push back against the crystallization, but they may not be able to keep it up.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_AREA03.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_AREA03.text: White Battlefield: Leone Bianco Palazzo in Danger

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_AREA03.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_AREA03.text: The wave of crystallization is approaching Leone Bianco Palazzo. At this rate, it won't be long before the entire region turns to crystal.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_AREA01_.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_AREA01_.text: The Calamity has begun to cause crystallization. If you don't do something quickly, the effects will spread unchecked across the land.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_AREA01_.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_AREA01_.text: The witches have managed to push back against the crystals, and are on the cusp of eradicating them from this region entirely.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_AREA02_.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_AREA02_.text: The crystallization process continues to spread across the land, and the witches are proving powerless to stop it.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_AREA02_.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_AREA02_.text: The witches have managed to push back against the crystallization, but they may not be able to keep it up.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_AREA03_.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_AREA03_.text: Blue Battlefield: Tree of the Forever Young in Danger

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_AREA03_.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_AREA03_.text: The wave of crystallization is approaching the Tree of the Forever Young. At this rate, it won't be long before the entire region turns to crystal.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_AREA0.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_AREA0.text: The Calamity has begun to cause crystallization. If you don't do something quickly, the effects will spread unchecked across the land.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_AREA0.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_AREA0.text: The witches have managed to push back against the crystals, and are on the cusp of eradicating them from this region entirely.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_AREA0.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_AREA0.text: The crystallization process continues to spread across the land, and the witches are proving powerless to stop it.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_AREA0.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_AREA0.text: The witches have managed to push back against the crystallization, but they may not be able to keep it up.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_AREA0.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_AREA0.text: Yellow Battlefield: Dusk Pinwheel in Danger

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_AREA0.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_AREA0.text: The wave of crystallization is approaching the Dusk Pinwheel. At this rate, it won't be long before the entire region turns to crystal.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_AREA01_0.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_AREA01_0.text: The Calamity has begun to cause crystallization. If you don't do something quickly, the effects will spread unchecked across the land.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_AREA01_0.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_AREA01_0.text: The witches have managed to push back against the crystals, and are on the cusp of eradicating them from this region entirely.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_AREA02_0.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_AREA02_0.text: The crystallization process continues to spread across the land, and the witches are proving powerless to stop it.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_AREA02_0.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_AREA02_0.text: The witches have managed to push back against the crystallization, but they may not be able to keep it up.

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_AREA03_0.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_AREA03_0.text: Red Battlefield: Flame Fortress in Danger

W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_AREA03_0.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_AREA03_0.text: The wave of crystallization is approaching the Flame Fortress. At this rate, it won't be long before the entire region turns to crystal.

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLAC.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLAC.text: Grete is a shy witch of the black, but perhaps she fights as ferociously on the battlefield as the other witches?

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLAC.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLAC.text: You wonder how Grete has been since giving you that powerful staff.

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLAC.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLAC.text: Grete the black witch has changed significantly since you first saw her. Perhaps the reason why lurks within this old castle.

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLAC.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLAC.text: The grey staff should still be in Grete's possession. You should find her and ask about it.

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLAC.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLAC.text: Grete is on her way to Castle Black Swan. If you wish to follow her, you'll need to pass through this floodgate.

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLUE.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLUE.text: You sense something amiss in the woods. What could be happening here?

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLUE.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLUE.text: The suspicious frog in the forest turned out to be Pierre, Lita's familiar. Pierre made a desperate dash for the Tree of the Forever Young, but where could Lita be?

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLUE.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLUE.text: Enter the Tree of the Forever Young

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLUE.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLUE.text: When Pierre left the castle, he was making his way to the Blue Forest—a site holy to the witches of the blue. What is he planning to do there?

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLUE.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLUE.text: Save the Tree of the Forever Young

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLUE.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLUE.text: Lita and Pierre ran underground to save the Tree of the Forever Young. Will you be able to rescue it—and them, for that matter?

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLUE.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_BLUE.text: Enter the Tree of the Forever Young

W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_RED_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_RED_000_DETAIL.text: You spy a lone armored figure standing away from the battlefield. Who could he be?

W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_RED_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_RED_010_DETAIL.text: You've been roped into breaking up a foolish squabble between two witch sisters. Will the Red Sage even listen to what you have to say?

W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_RED_020_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_RED_020_DETAIL.text: In the end, your involvement allows the red witch sisters to make up. But then tragedy strikes...

W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_RED_030_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_RED_030_DETAIL.text: You'll need a scale of the Salamander to create an antidote. You can find one in the Scorching Tower.

W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_RED_060_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_RED_060_DETAIL.text: This antidote will let you save the witch sisters.

W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_RED_031_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_RED_031_DETAIL.text: An item the two witch sisters have an emotional attachment to is said to be in this tower. What could it be?

W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_RED_051_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_RED_051_DETAIL.text: This is a village where the squires who serve the witches live. The assassin should be hiding among them.

W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_RED_061_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_RED_061_DETAIL.text: This antidote should let you save the witch sisters.

W02_EVAR_COMM_ASSASIN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_ASSASIN_000_DETAIL.text: The assassin leapt off the cliff. Perhaps his soul remains there?

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_YELL.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_YELL.text: The Calamity is still ongoing, yet the Dusk Pinwheel has begun moving about. What could be the cause?

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_YELL.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_YELL.text: The Dusk Pinwheel's compass is behaving strangely. Perhaps Willma the yellow witch knows why?

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_YELL.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_YELL.text: Willma is worried she might be a golem. Share her concerns with the Yellow Sage in order to calm her mind.

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_YELL.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_YELL.text: Perhaps the compass has decided to accept Willma? You will find the answer inside.

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_YELL.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_YELL.text: Willma may be a golem, but she has still proven her strength. What kind of future could be waiting for her?

W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_YELL.speaker: UI
W02_FUNC_COMM_WQT00_FIRST_SUB_EVENT_YELL.text: With the Calamity nearly ended, it's time to pick up Willma.

W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE_000_DETA.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE_000_DETA.text: You're desperate for any information as to where those two witches could be, however unreliable.

W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE_010_DETA.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE_010_DETA.text: Someone has a rumor to share about the two wayward witches.

W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE_020_DETA.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE_020_DETA.text: Those two witches seem to have found something.

W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE_030_DETA.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE_030_DETA.text: The vanished witches have returned, but two squires are now missing instead. This mystery needs to be solved.

W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE_040_DETA.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE_040_DETA.text: The two witches are fired up because of an order they received from the White Sage. Can you solve this mystery by visiting the mine where it all began?

W02_GIMK_COMM_PATHMOVE_BROOM_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_GIMK_COMM_PATHMOVE_BROOM_DETAIL.text: If you ask this broom nicely, it will apparently take you to Squire's Burg.

W02_GIMK_COMM_PATHMOVE_BROOM2_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_GIMK_COMM_PATHMOVE_BROOM2_DETAIL.text: If you climb onto this broom, it will take you somewhere.

W02_EVAR_COMM_DUNGEON_FREE_BATTLE_000_DE.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_DUNGEON_FREE_BATTLE_000_DE.text: You should be able to test your combat skills against the fiends raised in the greenhouse.

W02_EVAR_COMM_DUNGEON_FREE_BATTLE_010_DE.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_DUNGEON_FREE_BATTLE_010_DE.text: You should be able to test your combat skills against the fiends that live in this mine.

W02_EVAR_COMM_GREENHOUSE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_GREENHOUSE_000_DETAIL.text: Apparently this is the perfect environment for raising not only plants, but fiends. You should be able to test your combat skills here.

W02_EVAR_COMM_MINE_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_MINE_000_DETAIL.text: The fiends in this mine have been growing stronger. You should be able to put your combat skills to the test here.

W02_EVAR_COMM_FIRETOWER_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_FIRETOWER_000_DETAIL.text: No doubt you will find flaming hot fiends in the Scorching Tower. You should be able to test your combat skills against them.

W02_EVAR_COMM_FOSSAMAGNA_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W02_EVAR_COMM_FOSSAMAGNA_000_DETAIL.text: Something is writhing at the bottom of the ditch. This may be a good opportunity to test your strength.
